Desc:
<color=#fff45b>In this mode, No. 21's strength is modified.</color>
With full Synergy Energy, No. 21 can trigger a Synergy Switch by performing one of the following actions:
1. Enters the <color=#fff45b>Wolfspirit Form</color> and casts <color=#fff45b>the last Basic Attack hit</color>
<color=#fff45b>2. Casts Signature</color> - Sky-ripping Arcflash.
SkillDesc: Casts it with full Synergy Energy to deal massive Lightning DMG and then enters the Predator Stance. Tap Basic Attack to trigger Forceful Pounce.
Removes all members' debuffs. And for the next 5s, every time when dealing damage, restores HP equal to 2% of the DMG to all members.

Desc:
<color=#fff45b>In this mode, Noctis' strength is modified.</color>
With full Synergy Energy, Noctis can trigger a Synergy Switch by performing one of the following actions:
1. Casts <color=#fff45b>Magnetic Blast</color> to enter the Thunder Burst Form.
2. Casts <color=#fff45b>Skull Crush</color>.
SkillDesc: Casts with full Synergy Energy to deal massive Lightning DMG and directly enters the Burst Form.
Pulls enemies to the center for 5s and inflicts Sticky Mine on all of the enemies on the battlefield. Upon 20 stacks or when the time is up, deals Lightning DMG based on the number of stacks.

Desc:
<color=#fff45b>In this mode, Vera's strength is modified.</color>
With full Synergy Energy, Vera can trigger a Synergy Switch by performing one of the following actions:
1. Press and hold Basic Attack to <color=#fff45b>cast Lightning Fall</color>.
<color=#fff45b>2. Casts Signature</color> - Shining Piercer.
SkillDesc: Casts with full Synergy Energy to deal massive Lightning DMG and restores 3 stacks of Electric Charge. Press and hold Attack to follow up with a Lightning Fall.
Increases all members' DMG Reduction by 30% and Super Armor reduction speed by 100% for 5s.

Desc:
<color=#fff45b>With 100 Synergy Energy</color>, <color=#fff45b>cast a Signature</color> or <color=#fff45b>trigger the Core Passive</color> to trigger a <color=#fff45b>Synergy Switch</color>.
Performing a Synergy Switch after a <color=#fff45b>Signature</color> will <color=#fff45b>return 50 bonus</color> Synergy Energy.
Each Synergy Switch will grant 20 Synergy Signature Energy.
With full Synergy Signature Energy, press the button to send the enemy to hell.
SkillDesc: Casts with 99 Synergy Signature Energy to deal massive Lightning DMG across the screen.
Casting the Synergy Signature will increase all members' ATK by 25%. Can be stacked up to 5 times.
